General.Name: WISE iTech Co. Ltd
General.Description: WISE iTech Co., Ltd. provides machine learning, big data analysis, data quality, and public data opening solutions. The company offers WISE Prophet, a machine running process automation tool; WISE Intelligence, an insight production tool with big data; and WISE DQ, a system that automatically detects anomalies in the data to be analyzed, and maintains the accuracy and quality of the data through diagnosis, derivation, and analysis. It also provides WISE Meta, which manages the whole process from data standards to data model management, database reflection, and data flow information by applying machine learning technology; and WISE Open, an optimal platform to support the open life cycle of public data for the discovery, collection, opening, and utilization of various data. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.
